summary: Mario, designed by Shigeru Miyamoto, is a famous Italian plumber in video games. He first appeared in *Donkey Kong* (1981) and later got his own series, *Super Mario Bros.*, which became a huge success. Mario is known for his mustache, overalls, and saving Princess Peach from Bowser. He has appeared in over 200 games, including *Mario Kart* and *Paper Mario*. With his unique look and fun adventures, Mario has become a pop culture icon and Nintendo's mascot. Many people love playing as Mario, making him one of the most recognized characters in gaming history.
title: Mario
